statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT user_id, fov_angle, game_difficulty FROM user_preferences WHERE control_scheme = 'Mouse & Keyboard'
SELECT user_id, fov_angle, game_difficulty, last_played FROM user_preferences ORDER BY last_played DESC
SELECT user_id, fov_angle, game_difficulty, last_played FROM user_preferences WHERE game_difficulty = 'Hard' ORDER BY fov_angle ASC
SELECT user_id, control_scheme, last_played FROM user_preferences WHERE fov_angle > 90
SELECT user_id, fov_angle, last_played FROM user_preferences WHERE game_difficulty = 'Hard';
SELECT user_id, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE last_played > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE control_scheme = 'Mouse & Keyboard' AND fov_angle > 90 ORDER BY last_played DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_difficulty FROM user_preferences WHERE fov_angle < 70 OR control_scheme = 'Gamepad' ORDER BY game_difficulty ASC;
SELECT user_id, fov_angle, game_difficulty FROM user_preferences WHERE game_difficulty <> 'Easy' AND fov_angle BETWEEN 60 AND 90 ORDER BY user_id ASC, game_difficulty DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, game_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, behavior_data FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, behavior_data FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences LEFT JOIN user_behavior ON user_preferences.user_id = user_behavior.user_id;
SELECT user_id, game_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, behavior_data FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, game_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 AND game_preferences->>'genre' = 'Action';
SELECT user_id, behavior_data, game_preferences FROM user_behavior JOIN user_preferences ON user_behavior.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM UserBehavior WHERE action_type = 'click';
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, experience_name FROM PersonalizedExperiences ORDER BY experience_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(experience_id) AS num_experiences FROM PersonalizedExperiences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT action_date, action_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE action_type = 'click' ORDER BY action_date DESC
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'dark mode' AND preference_2 = 'notifications' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, experience_name FROM PersonalizedExperiences JOIN UserPreferences ON PersonalizedExperiences.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(experience_id) AS num_experiences FROM PersonalizedExperiences GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_experiences > 2
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, age, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, game_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_history ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM game_preferences WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC
SELECT username, email, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 AND location = 'New York'
SELECT user_id, game_id, difficulty_level FROM game_preferences WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' AND favorite_genre = 'Action'
SELECT user_id, game_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_history WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, recommended_game_id, recommendation_score FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences ORDER BY favorite_genre DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_genre, game_rating FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE game_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM game_reviews WHERE review_rating < 3.0 ORDER BY review_rating ASC, review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT username, age, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, gender, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior;
SELECT game_name, game_rating FROM virtual_reality_games WHERE game_rating > 4 ORDER BY game_rating DESC, game_name ASC;
